original_text:
Can I forget any longer the treasures of wickedness in the house of the wicked,
    and the scant measure that is accursed?
korean_text: 악인의 집에 아직도 불의한 재물이 있느냐 축소시킨 가증한 에바가 있느냐

sentences.original_text: Can I forget any longer the treasures of wickedness in the house of the wicked
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 더 이상 잊을 수 있겠느냐, 악인의 집에 있는 사악한 보물들을

sentences.original_text: and the scant measure that is accursed?
